page.title: 06The Butcher (2 of 2 pages)
page.content: {WHAT ABOUT ENTERTAINMENT? }Well in a little place like{Coltishall}we haven't got much to do. In the old days I used to go into the city to the theatre, my wife still likes to watch a play. These days we make do with the pub. I bowl and play darts, but mostly we watch the telly. {WHAT ABOUT YOUNGER PEOPLE? }I sometimes feel sorry for them, but of course the city isn't that far away, and most of them have motorbikes or cars now anyway. The very young ones are the worst off unless their parents ferry them about. {DO YOU LIKE THE AREA? }I've lived here all my life and I wouldn't go anywhere else. The people are friendly and they know everybody, even the new people.
